about_the_game:
It's an exhilarating VR game where players take on the role of a brave female warrior who fights monsters and upgrades her way through a gothic-inspired city.



The city in the game is full of gloomy, shabby, and dangerous atmosphere, with tall churches and pointed roofs all adding a mysterious and eerie feel to the city. In the game, players will be armed with shields and long swords and engage in fierce battles. Monsters come in a variety of forms, some are fierce and unusual, some are extremely cunning, and players need to use their weapons flexibly to defeat these monsters.
During gameplay, a progress bar will be displayed above the player's head, showing the player's health, mana, and experience points. When attacked by monsters, mana and health are consumed, and once the health is depleted, the player dies and respawns at the initial point. When the experience reaches 100, the player levels up and restores his HP at the same time. Therefore, when playing the game, you need to pay attention to the progress bar in time and take appropriate measures to fight monsters.
In short, this game is full of excitement and challenges, and the fierce battle scenes in the game will also give players an unprecedented visual experience.



Controls
Move Left handle up/down/left/right
Turn Right handle left/right
Reset Position Left handle grip
Attack Right handle trigger
Power Attack Left handle trigger
Sprint Right handle up
Roll Right handle down
Menu Handle menu key
